statements: UPDATE reviews SET approval_status='approved' WHERE review_id = 1;
UPDATE reviews SET review_date='2022-01-20' WHERE reviewer_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE reviews SET reviewer_name='Alice', review_text='Great work!', approval_status='Approved' WHERE review_id=1;
UPDATE reviews SET review_date='2022-07-15', approval_status='Rejected', reviewer_name='Bob', review_text='Needs improvement' WHERE review_id=2;
UPDATE reviews SET approval_status = 'Approved' WHERE review_id = 1;
UPDATE approval_workflows SET approver_user = 'John Doe', approval_date = '2022-01-15 10:00:00' WHERE workflow_id = 3;
UPDATE reviews SET reviewer_name = 'John Doe', approval_status = 'Approved' WHERE review_id = 123;
UPDATE approval_workflows SET approval_step = 2, approval_date = '2022-01-15 08:00:00' WHERE workflow_id = 456;
UPDATE reviews SET approval_status = 'Approved' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE approval_workflows SET status = 'Completed' WHERE reviewer_id = 2 AND review_id = 5;
UPDATE reviews SET review_text = 'Updated review text', approval_status = 'Approved' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE approval_workflows SET status = 'Completed' WHERE reviewer_id = 3;
UPDATE review_data SET rating = 4 WHERE review_id = 1;
UPDATE moderation_workflow SET status = 'completed', assigned_to = 'John Doe' WHERE review_id = 2;
UPDATE review_data SET rating = 4, review_text = 'Updated review text' WHERE review_id = 12345;
UPDATE moderation_workflow SET assigned_to = 'John Doe', status = 'Pending' WHERE review_id = 12345;
UPDATE reviews SET rating = 5, approved = true WHERE review_id = 1;
UPDATE moderators SET approval_limit = 10, email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE moderator_id = 3;
UPDATE reviews SET review_text = 'Updated review text', rating = 4, approved = TRUE WHERE review_id = 123;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', role = 'admin' WHERE user_id = 456;
